attributes.action: Not to Accept more asylum seekers and not to increase support refugee migrants
attributes.background: The UK as taken in to many immigrants over the past 12 years putting strain on public services NHS schools we ask the government to restrict any more asylum seekers and not to increase support for refugee migrants in the UK.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107142

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
